mapper.insert:
insert into product
product_id,
product_name,
product_type,
image,
note,
status,

#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.sql: pid, pname, estoreprice, markprice, pnum, cid, imgurl, description
mapper.insert: insert into product (pid, pname, estoreprice, markprice, pnum, cid, imgurl, description) values (#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{estoreprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{markprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into product
pid,
pname,
estoreprice,
markprice,
pnum,
cid,
imgurl,
description,
#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{estoreprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{markprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{pnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update product
pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
estoreprice = #{estoreprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
markprice = #{markprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
pnum = #{pnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
imgurl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update product set pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, estoreprice = #{estoreprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, markprice = #{markprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pnum = #{pnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imgurl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
